title: Ticket #7428: Redundant footer in man pages
description:
Starting in 8.9.5, I see the following footer at the bottom of all the man pages: 

AUTHOR
       Center for High Throughput Computing, University of Wisconsin-Madison

COPYRIGHT
       Copyright � 1990-2019 Center for High Throughput Computing, Computer Sciences Department, University of Wisconsin-Madison, Madison, WI. All Rights Reserved. Licensed under the Apache
       License, Version 2.0.

AUTHOR
       HTCondor

COPYRIGHT
       Center for High Throughput Computing, University of Wisconsin�Madison, 2019

Looks like perhaps one copy is coming from the copy/pasted lines at the bottom of all the manpages while the other comes from somewhere inside Sphinx?
remarks:
2019-Dec-12 11:21:55 by tim:
Footer is coming from sphinx and cut and pasted in. Eliminate the redundancy and take the best from each one.
2020-Apr-10 07:42:27 by tim:
Bulk change of target version from v080808 to v080809 using ticket-target-mover.
check_ins: 2020-Apr-11 14:38   Check-in [59323]: (#7428) Spruce up manual copyright and fix up man pages (By Tim Theisen )
creator: bbockelm
